name: Seven Union Sins
description:
Seven Union Sins

Can you truly survive with or without your powers? Seven powers unified within the body of a human, taken away, you become a non-human and simply weaker than the average wraith that floats around this dead apocalyptic world. 

Note:

This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2021

This is not a mature game.

This game can be downloaded, if your browser is not powerful enough.

How to play:
In this world, you can only survive in the vicinity of your soul, your Coffin.
You have seven powers, seven Sins, deactivating them will refuse your soul and will weaken you whilst having many will strengthen you but will make the game harder.
In short, joined together, stronger together, lesser joined, weaker together.
Good luck, young Coffineers.

Use and move your mouse to aim

1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7
These numbers activate and deactivate the cards underneath, however except for the Seven Card, Lust, will not activate after you have deactivated it once more.
Press the button 'Tab' to show the cards fully
Tab

You can use different power to kill your enemy, provided the cards are active.
Wrath kills your enemies in a huge fireball, Pride multiplies the damage of your attack, Envy steals the life force of your enemies and use it to heal yourself, Sloth is a power that you can only use three times in which the power that bombs the enemies around you for several seconds however at the cost of some of your health,  Greed throws gold ores at your enemies, Gluttony devours the enemies around you at very close range provided you charge at them, and the last one, Lust will attract more enemies to you when active.

Those powers use different buttons, as your movement is controlled by the mouse and keyboard. It will be centered around the WASD keys.
Q for Wrath

E for Envy

Z for Sloth

X for Greed

C for Gluttony

And thus, if you have no power to speak of, then to press the tilde key to shoot normally is your friend.
